snippet: Campaigns in the 0-10% ACoS bucket drive a disproportionate share of sales; consider shifting budget toward these winners.
Broad match is absorbing high spend with weaker efficiency relative to Exact; tighten negatives and reallocate budget to Exact.
Keyword ACoS sits below account average while maintaining sales share; scale these terms before expanding new targets.
ASIN targets show stronger RoAS than other buckets; expand ASIN coverage to grow efficient sales.
Paused targets still show residual spend; verify status sync and ensure budget is not leaking into inactive entities.
